snippet: The new ads continue the theme introduced in 2010, "There's nothing like Australia." But with the Australian dollar stronger than it was two years ago, the pitch to come visit has to be stronger too, officials say.
abstract: The new ads continue the theme introduced in 2010, "There's nothing like Australia." But with the Australian dollar stronger than it was two years ago, the pitch to come visit has to be stronger too, officials say.

headline.main: New Ad Campaign to Highlight 'More Sophisticated' Australia
